title: 1.12.2如何禁用mek的矿石
author: 千晓千晓
txt_content:
如题，求指点怎么禁用mek的矿石..
配置文件搞不懂，怎么弄都还是会生成





pz.png
(29.68 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-2-8 14:43 上传

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
千晓千晓 发表于 2020-2-9 14:28
找不着啊
config/mekanism.cfg

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
找到
    # Chance that copper generates in a chunk. (0 to Disable)
    I:CopperPerChunk=16
和
    # Chance that tin generates in a chunk. (0 to Disable)
    I:TinPerChunk=14

这两项改成0

replies.author: 千晓千晓
replies.txt_content:
恋 发表于 2020-2-8 15:03
找到
    # Chance that copper generates in a chunk. (0 to Disable)
    I:CopperPerChunk=16
找不着啊

replies.txt_content:
